imgDesc.text:
Artifact Definition: Consume <color=#ffe14b>Sanctifying Elixir</color> to generate Artifacts of the designated <color=#ffe14b>Set</color> and <color=#ffe14b>Piece</color> , with the designated <color=#ffe14b>Main Affix</color> and <color=#ffe14b>some of the Minor Affixes</color> .
Artifact Extraction: Consume 5-star Artifacts of Lv. 4 and above to extract <color=#ffe14b>Sanctifying Elixir</color> .
The amount of <color=#ffe14b>Sanctifying Elixir</color> that can be extracted in a single period is limited, and each Artifact Set can be defined once this way per period.
